QuestData.Title: Terokk's Fall
QuestData.Description:
<Once again, Reshad's voice envelops you.>
Terokk was a powerful and respected king, beloved by his people.
His sages, however, were not so loyal. Hungry for control of Skyreach, they conspired against him.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Listen carefully to the tale of Terokk's Fall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Effigy of Terokk to re-live Terokk's fall. Find Lithic, rally $2oa Outcast Talon Guards, slay $3oa Crazed Outcasts, and use the Eye of Anzu.
QuestData.RewardText: Since that day, the sages have remained in power in Skyreach, now calling themselves the Adherents of Rukhmar and claiming to be the heralds of Her will.
